bowler noun [C]
(PERSON)
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who bowls (= throws the ball), especially in cricket
IndiaPix/IndiaPicture/GettyImages fast/pace bowler
in cricket, a bowler who bowls the ball fast: It isn't easy to score runs against pace bowlers.
See more spin bowler
in cricket, a bowler who spins the ball so that when it hits the ground it bounces in an unexpected way, making it difficult to hit: Rivers, a left-arm spin bowler from Northhamptonshire, conceded just eleven runs from ten overs.
